translations: v．批准，认可：正式同意并使之生效，通常指对法律、协议或条约的批准。

sentences.sentence: In other words, if Australia ratifies this treaty, it will need to work out its own position on the matter.
sentences.translation: 换句话说，如果澳大利亚批准这一条约，就需要制订对此事自己的立场。

sentences.sentence: If India ratifies the deal, that will put it on the brink of going into force well ahead of the original 2020 target.
sentences.translation: 如果印度批准这项协议，就很可能使该协议的实施日期大大早于最初预期的2020年。

sentences.sentence: It was kind of a joke but it also ratifies or codifies a set of beautiful friendships and my closeness to those people. How close I feel to them.
sentences.translation: 这虽然是个笑话，却也促成了许多美好的友谊，还拉近了我和那些人的距离，心与心的距离。
